content: I’m surprised nobody in the Democratic party researched his family given the Democrats addiction to racial identity politics. The Gorsuch Family is quite patriotic and it’s roots date back to the Revolution. The Gorsuch’s had a farm in Maryland. Some of the Revolution was fought in their front yard. Edward Gorsuch isn’t famous for the Revolutionary war though but he is famous for being murdered. Edward and his sons obtained a valid warrant and sought the return of their slave property in Pennsylvania. The confrontation occurred and after an exchange of words several were shot and Edward Gorsuch lay dead. The date was September 11, 1851, and the event came to be known famously as at “Christiana’s Riot”. Many say it sparked the Civil War. Edwards youngest son Tommy Gorsuch was not present because he was in school with his friend and class mate John Wilkes Booth at the Milton Academy in Sparks, Maryland. The same person who was accused of Assassination of President Lincoln. General Lee surrendered his Army of Northern Virginia on April 9, 1865. Lee was permitted to keep his sword and his horse, Traveller. On April 14, 1865, President Lincoln was shot by John Wilkes Booth. In December 1860, Booth had drafted a speech which he planned to deliver in Philadelphia. Whether he delivered the speech is unknown as it was discovered by his brother, Edwin, in a trunk of John Wilkes Booth’s belongings. In the final paragraph of the original manuscript that survived, he recounted his friendship with Tommy Gorsuch and lamented the loss of his playmate’s father.
